events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the customer's report of receiving the incorrect item.
An agent specializing in refund cases has been assigned to manage this customer's request for a refund.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number, so we can verify and proceed with the refund?
Here is the photo of the wrong product and my order number is 123456789. Please let me know how long the refund will take.
Thank you for the details. We have approved your refund and it should be processed within 5 to 7 business days. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Thanks for the quick response and the update. I appreciate the help and look forward to the refund.
Your refund request has been successfully resolved and processed on our end. Please contact us again if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if everything has been completed to your satisfaction.
As we have received no further issues from you, we are closing this case. Thank you for your cooperation and understanding.
